name: Avoid Modules with more then 1 statement per line  (FORTRAN)
description: All the Lines of code (LoC) are taken into account, and compared to the number of statements. Whenever the artifact has LoC/STMT > 1, the artifact is reported as violation. The number of statements is calculated based on the Fortran statements
rationale: There should be only 1 instruction per line. Homogenisation of the presentation to improve readability and comprehension of the code
remediation: Reduce the number of statements per line; look for simpeler solution to implement the functionality

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
